title: New Spidey Suit Revealed! -The Kinda Funny Morning Show 10.18.18
description:
Start your trial month of Hims at http://forhims.com/morningshow
Learn more about SimpliSafe today at http://simplisafe.com/morning.

Andy and Nick take a look at the new Spier-Man suit in Far From Home, and talk about their newest Party Mode that took the entire crew to the streetz!

News and Other Topics Covered:
-Nick was impressed with the Buffallo wild wings service (28:10 mins)
-Sneak peak clip of the upcoming party mode (38:00 mins)
-Tom Holland announces spider-man far from home filming wrap with look at the new suit (42:36 mins)
-Narcos: Mexico trailer (45:40 mins)
-Superman TV show reportedly in development at the CW (50:20 mins)

Thanks to https://www.twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
